document_data.name: Free Space Alliance
document_data.mainbody: The '''Free Space Alliance''' was a military cooperation between the spacefaring races of [[Realmspace]], [[Greyspace]], and [[Krynnspace]], formed in the mid‒14{{th}} century [[DR]] as a defense against the threat of invasion by the [[Vodoni Empire]] during the [[War of the Spheres]].
document_data.Activities: The Alliance led an attack into [[Vodonispace]] in order to counter their offensive and defeat their leader, [[Vulkaran]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The first meeting of the Alliance took place in the [[Rock of Bral]] in the [[Tears of Selûne]].{{Rock of Bral location}} Subsequent meetings were organized aboard the flagship of the Alliance fleet, the [[Armada (spelljammer)|armada]] ''[[Arrow of Justice]]'', commanded by admiral [[Icarus]] of [[Realmspace]].
document_data.Members:
The Free Space Alliance was led by the ''Arrow of Justice''. Its forces included large contingents of [[human]]s, [[elf|elves]], [[dwarves]], and [[gnome]]s, as well as smaller numbers of [[mind flayer]]s, [[beholder]]s, [[lizardfolk]], [[ogre]]s, and, initially, [[neogi]].

In the late stages of the war, the neogi switched sides and turned against the Alliance.
